Busy End of Summer

Posted on September 16, 2012 by mike

OK…got a bit behind in my entries this past month or so and I apologize. One of the biggest weeks of my year happened on Aug. 27th and I’ll share a few of the images below…which may help explain why I was slacking on my Lonely Road Blog entries.

I have been to Burning Man 6 years running now and was blessed to go again with my amazing campmates and friends! In doing so, I’m gifted with a week of amazing and open-minded people who validate my art and also take it to a whole other level! Man, what a place. Music, art, zany, sexy, unique….and wonderful….it’s such a different experience for all who attend. Anyway….it is my excuse for falling behind in blog entries of late and I hope you forgive me. I also hope you keep an eye out on Facebook for more of my images from this year’s Burn…and that I see you at my camp, Spank Bank, next year on the playa!

Whoooop Whoooooooooop
